name: Nightwatch Soup
effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.
description: Illuga's specialty. A steaming bowl of hot soup, just a sip after returning from the night patrol can melt away fatigue and ease tense nerves. Such an effect is likely the result of the young captain's years of accumulated experience, perfected into his own unique recipe.
